name: Bomberfox
description:
This is a game where you get to blow up things. Use a controller for best experience!

Downloadable version is a bit heavier and might require a decent PC to run.

The game was created as a student project:

  • Art - Niilo Kajala, Hannu Timonen
  • Programming - Eppu Syyrakki, Laura Huovinen
  • Sound FX - Pekka Juntunen
  • Animation - Emilia Mikkola
